body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Harold Morris and the customer's name is Kathleen Hayes.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Harold Morris from Phat Hogs, your trusted motorcycle dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Harold, I’m Kathleen Hayes. I’m just trying to find some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Kathleen! What specific information are you looking for? Perhaps details on our latest models?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I would like to know more about the latest models and their prices.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! May I ask for your zip code so I can provide you with the most accurate information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s two one zero zero two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide me with your email address? This way, I can send you all the details directly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Absolutely! It’s kathleen.hayes at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you so much for that information, Kathleen. I will send you a list of our latest models and prices right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Harold! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kathleen! Thank you for your time today. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
